item.title: Hey i have on whole height 0 nonwild how to change?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

public boolean inwildy = false;
public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) && (absX <= 3672 && absx >= 10112))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = false;
}
}
And Add This

public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= MAX Y VALUE && absY >= MIN Y VALUE) && (absX <= MAX X VALUE && absX >= MIN X VALUE))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
}

And This Below
public boolean inwildy = false;
add the blow below that
public boolean inwildy2 = false;
From Your Friendly Neighbour Hood Tythus

P.S. Please tell Me If There Are Any Problems…
